entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , L'Anse-au-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:49 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -22.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 09:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -22.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -28.7°C
Wind: NNE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 9.
